column3: News;Phnom Penh: In the morning of September 22
column5: the police force of the Criminal Police of Phnom Penh Capital sent 20 suspected men and women gamblers to the prosecution of the Phnom Penh Municipal Court.------According to Colonel Bun Satya
column6: chief of the Phnom Penh Municipal Criminal Court
column10: there were raids on ------locations where illegal gambling and illegal virtual gambling games were taking place.------Location 1: A card shark room den at # 87
column15: Phnom Penh.------Location 2: A fish game computer gambling joint at Village No 20
column18: Phnom Penh.------Location 3: ------  ------An illegal gambling  and fish game den at Village No 20
column22: cash and a kniife were taken as evidence
column23: and all the betting junkies were gathered together for an en masse group selfie.------http://cambodiapolice.com/policekh/116606
